image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic shot inside a modern, high-tech manufacturing facility. The background is a blur of automated machinery, conveyor belts, and robotic arms, lit with cool industrial blues and warm amber safety lights. The atmosphere is professional, focused, and futuristic, emphasizing the collaboration between human expertise and artificial intelligence. 8k resolution, highly detailed textures on the PPE and machinery.
